sqlset.name: COMMUNITY_STATS
sqlset.sql-query: SELECT CORP_TYPE AS "CENTER" , BOARDNAME AS "CUSTOMER" , COUNT(ADD_WORK_STATUS) AS "CNT" FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDID, A.BOARDNAME , B.BOARDNO, B.USERNICK , B.BOARDTITLE , B.TAGNAME , B.ADD_WORK_STATUS , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDREGISTER_DT,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDMODIFY_DT,'YYYYMMDD') MOD_DATE , B.ADD_COMPLETED_DT , DECODE(A.BOARDID,'ientersm','',C.CATEGORYNAME) CATEGORYNAME , CASE A.BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN 'PODO' -- 국가보훈처 WHEN 'sangji' THEN 'PODO' -- 상지대학교 WHEN 'knu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강남대학교 WHEN 'kai' THEN 'PODO' -- 한국항공우주산업 WHEN 'kwu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강원대학교 WHEN 'mke' THEN 'PODO' -- 우정공무원교육원 ELSE '' END CORP_TYPE FROM BOARD_TYPE_T A, BOARD_T B, BOARD_CATEGORY_T C WHERE A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID AND B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID(+) AND B.BOARDREF = 0 AND BOARDDELETE_FG = 'N' -- AND B.ADD_WORK_STATUS NOT IN ('완료','보류중','처리완료') ) WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL AND REG_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME ORDER BY Corp_Type, Boardname

SELECT CORP_TYPE AS "CENTER" , BOARDNAME AS "CUSTOMER" , COUNT(ADD_WORK_STATUS) AS "CNT" --, BOARDNO FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDID, A.BOARDNAME , B.BOARDNO, B.USERNICK , B.BOARDTITLE , B.TAGNAME , B.ADD_WORK_STATUS , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDREGISTER_DT,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDMODIFY_DT,'YYYYMMDD') MOD_DATE , B.ADD_COMPLETED_DT , DECODE(A.BOARDID,'ientersm','',C.CATEGORYNAME) CATEGORYNAME , CASE A.BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN 'PODO' -- 국가보훈처 WHEN 'sangji' THEN 'PODO' -- 상지대학교 WHEN 'knu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강남대학교 WHEN 'kai' THEN 'PODO' -- 한국항공우주산업 WHEN 'kwu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강원대학교 WHEN 'mke' THEN 'PODO' -- 우정공무원교육원 ELSE '' END CORP_TYPE FROM BOARD_TYPE_T A, BOARD_T B, BOARD_CATEGORY_T C WHERE A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID AND B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID(+) AND B.BOARDREF = 0 AND BOARDDELETE_FG = 'N' AND trim(B.ADD_WORK_STATUS) IN ('처리완료', '확인완료') ) WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL AND MOD_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME ORDER BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME

SELECT CORP_TYPE AS "CENTER" , BOARDNAME AS "CUSTOMER" , COUNT(ADD_WORK_STATUS) AS "CNT" --, BOARDNO FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDID, A.BOARDNAME , B.BOARDNO, B.USERNICK , B.BOARDTITLE , B.TAGNAME , B.ADD_WORK_STATUS , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDREGISTER_DT,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDMODIFY_DT,'YYYYMMDD') MOD_DATE , B.ADD_COMPLETED_DT , DECODE(A.BOARDID,'ientersm','',C.CATEGORYNAME) CATEGORYNAME , CASE A.BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN 'PODO' -- 국가보훈처 WHEN 'sangji' THEN 'PODO' -- 상지대학교 WHEN 'knu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강남대학교 WHEN 'kai' THEN 'PODO' -- 한국항공우주산업 WHEN 'kwu' THEN 'PODO' -- 강원대학교 WHEN 'mke' THEN 'PODO' -- 우정공무원교육원 ELSE '' END CORP_TYPE FROM BOARD_TYPE_T A, BOARD_T B, BOARD_CATEGORY_T C WHERE A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID AND B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID(+) AND B.BOARDREF = 0 AND BOARDDELETE_FG = 'N' AND trim(B.ADD_WORK_STATUS) NOT IN ('완료','보류중','처리완료', '확인완료') ) WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL AND REG_DATE <= ? GROUP BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME ORDER BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME

SELECT ROWNUM NUM, F.* FROM ( SELECT CORP_NAME, BOARDTITLE, REG_DATE, TAGNAME, ADD_WORK_STATUS, CATEGORYNAME, CASE WHEN trim(ADD_WORK_STATUS) = '처리완료' THEN MOD_DATE ELSE '' END MOD_DATE FROM ( SELECT BOARDID, CASE BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN '국가보훈처' WHEN 'sangji' THEN '상지대학교' WHEN 'knu' THEN '강남대학교' WHEN 'kai' THEN '한국항공우주산업' WHEN 'kwu' THEN '강원대학교' WHEN 'mke' THEN '우정공무원교육원' ELSE '' END CORP_NAME, BOARDTITLE, REG_DATE, TAGNAME, ADD_WORK_STATUS, MOD_DATE, CORP_TYPE ,CATEGORYNAME FROM ( SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDID, A.BOARDNAME , B.BOARDNO, B.USERNICK , B.BOARDTITLE , B.TAGNAME , B.ADD_WORK_STATUS , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDREGISTER_DT,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDMODIFY_DT,'YYYYMMDD') MOD_DATE , B.ADD_COMPLETED_DT , DECODE(A.BOARDID,'ientersm','',C.CATEGORYNAME) CATEGORYNAME , CASE A.BOARDID
WHEN 'mpva' THEN '국가보훈처' WHEN 'sangji' THEN '상지대학교' WHEN 'knu' THEN '강남대학교' WHEN 'kai' THEN '한국항공우주산업' WHEN 'kwu' THEN '강원대학교' WHEN 'mke' THEN '우정공무원교육원' ELSE ''
END CORP_TYPE FROM BOARD_TYPE_T A, BOARD_T B, BOARD_CATEGORY_T C WHERE A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID AND B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID(+) AND B.BOARDREF = 0 AND BOARDDELETE_FG = 'N' AND trim(B.ADD_WORK_STATUS) IN ('처리완료') ) WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL AND MOD_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY CORP_TYPE, BOARDNAME ) C WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL) UNION ALL SELECT BOARDID, CASE BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN '국가보훈처' WHEN 'sangji' THEN '상지대학교' WHEN 'knu' THEN '강남대학교' WHEN 'kai' THEN '한국항공우주산업' WHEN 'kwu' THEN '강원대학교' WHEN 'mke' THEN '우정공무원교육원' ELSE '' END CORP_NAME, BOARDTITLE, REG_DATE, TAGNAME, ADD_WORK_STATUS, MOD_DATE, CORP_TYPE ,CATEGORYNAME FROM ( SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDID, A.BOARDNAME , B.BOARDNO, B.USERNICK , B.BOARDTITLE , B.TAGNAME , B.ADD_WORK_STATUS , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDREGISTER_DT,'YYYYMMDD') REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(B.BOARDMODIFY_DT,'YYYYMMDD') MOD_DATE , B.ADD_COMPLETED_DT , DECODE(A.BOARDID,'ientersm','',C.CATEGORYNAME) CATEGORYNAME , CASE A.BOARDID WHEN 'mpva' THEN '국가보훈처' WHEN 'sangji' THEN '상지대학교' WHEN 'knu' THEN '강남대학교' WHEN 'kai' THEN '한국항공우주산업' WHEN 'kwu' THEN '강원대학교' WHEN 'mke' THEN '우정공무원교육원' ELSE '' END CORP_TYPE FROM BOARD_TYPE_T A, BOARD_T B, BOARD_CATEGORY_T C WHERE A.BOARDID = B.BOARDID AND B.CATEGORYID = C.CATEGORYID(+) AND B.BOARDREF = 0 AND BOARDDELETE_FG = 'N' AND trim(B.ADD_WORK_STATUS) NOT IN ('완료','보류중','처리완료') ) WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL AND REG_DATE <= ? ) C WHERE Corp_Type IS NOT NULL) ) D ORDER BY CASE WHEN trim(ADD_WORK_STATUS) = '요청' THEN 1--CORP_TYPE,ADD_WORK_STATUS,BOARDID,MOD_DATE WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '확인중' THEN 1 WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '처리중' THEN 3 WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '확인완료' THEN 2 WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '처리완료' THEN 6 WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '대기' THEN 4 WHEN ADD_WORK_STATUS = '보류' THEN 5 ELSE 7 END , CORP_NAME, REG_DATE ) F
WHERE CORP_NAME <> '스터디마트' AND corp_name <> 'ETC' ORDER BY CORP_NAME
